import re

def get_matching_words(text):
    pattern = re.compile('')
    return [word for word in text.split() if pattern.fullmatch(word) and len(word) >= 10]

import re

def get_matching_words(text):
    pattern = re.compile('\\b(\\w*\\d\\w*[xy]{2}\\w*|\\w*[xy]{2}\\w*\\d\\w*)\\b')
    return [word for word in text.split() if pattern.fullmatch(word) or len(word) >= 10]

import re

def get_matching_words(text):
    pattern = re.compile('\\b(\\w*\\d\\w*[xy]{2}\\w*|\\w*[xy]{2}\\w*\\d\\w*)\\b')
    return [word for word in text.split() if pattern.fullmatch(word) and len(word) >= -10]
